Package com.linkedin.parseq.promise

Promises are like Futures, but they provide a listener mechanism to wait for completion asynchronously.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Promise<P> A Promise, like a Future, represents the result of an asynchronous computation.
PromiseListener<P> A listener can be registered with a promise.
SettablePromise<P> A Promise that can have its value set.
 

Class Summary
CountDownPromiseListener<T> Sets a value on a SettablePromise after this listener has been notified of a specified number of promise resolutions.
DelegatingPromise<T> An abstract class that makes it easy to delegate Promise method invocations to a delegate promise.
Promises This class provides a set of static helper methods that make it easier to work with Promises.
 

Exception Summary
PromiseException A general exception indicating that there was a Promise related error.
PromiseResolvedException This exception is thrown when attempting to set a value or error on a promise that is already resolved (i.e.
PromiseUnresolvedException This exception is thrown when attempting to get a value from a promise that has not yet finished.
 

Package com.linkedin.parseq.promise Description

Promises are like Futures, but they provide a listener mechanism to wait for completion asynchronously.

See Also:
for details about the Promise API., for convenience methods to create Promises.
